title: Caught Flat-Footed During March Rally? How To Filter Out The Noise
description: Investors have been bombarded with negative headlines in 2022: inflation, rising rates, war in Ukraine and more. And if you rely on headlines alone, you can miss big shifts in the market, like what we saw in mid-March. Join Investor’s Business Daily news editor Ed Carson and Alissa Coram, IBD’s multimedia content editor, as they discuss how investors can filter out the noise by focusing on market signals, industry rankings, chart patterns and more.
